body.name: US Stove Company Rustic 900 Square Foot Clean Cast Iron Log Burning Wood Stove with Integrated Cooking Surface and Cool Touch Safety Handle
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 30 mins
features: Cook on an indoor cast iron stove capable of reaching temperatures up to 54,000 BTUs and heat up 900 square feet of surface for use as both a cooking stove and a heater at home
Comes equipped with a 2-piece safety handle that remains cool and safe to touch even as the stove is burning and a heavy duty cast iron body to bring classic and modern styles together
Large enough to fit logs of up to 19 inches in length to keep your stove burning for a long time and saving you less log-cutting trips when running low on fuel
Use the integrated 6.25 inch cooking surface on top of the stove to prepare your food as it is heating up your cabin for those cold winter nights and get both sustenance and warmth in one go
Stands at 33 inches long and 18.5 inches wide with 23 inches of height and a weight of about 130 pounds for ideal use in cabins and other small structures outdoors
body.description: Are you an outdoorsman looking for a fireplace and a wood burning stove rolled into one for your cabin in the woods? Do you also want something that brings you back to the good old days before the technology of today? The US Stove Company has just what you need with the US1269E, a big, rustic, heavy-duty cast iron wood stove for your warmth and sustenance. The US1269E measures 33 inches long, 18.5 inches wide, and 23 inches high with a weight of about 130 pounds, so it may not be portable enough to bring camping with you or carry around the house, it can do just right when sitting in the middle of your cabin. The stove is capable of reaching a maximum of 54,000 BTUs and heating up 900 square feet of space around it for a reliable heat source you can cook your hot soup on during a cold winter’s night. Worry less about your fuel source because this stove can accept logs of up to 19 inches in length so you can keep the furnace burning for longer periods of time while taking less trips to get the logs when you’re running low. When it’s time to insert a new batch, it’s easy to fill up this stove thanks to the 2-piece safety handle that keeps itself cool to the touch while it’s burning, allowing you to refuel while using the stove. Even with aesthetics, the US1269E provides warmth to you thanks to its heavy-duty cast iron body that does more than make it sturdy and last longer. It combines its simple and classic design with modern technology for a true combination of nostalgia and efficiency. Now, you can give your cabin or retreat house that classic aesthetic without discarding the efficiency of a modern day heater and stove. Bring the best warmth to your outdoor home with the US1269E from the US Stove Company and bask in the comfort and satisfaction of a nice heater in the middle of a cold night and a hot meal cooked by the same source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worked great first year. The bottoms of the firebox cracked first burn with a tiny fire today.Update. Us stove co. Has replace the whole unit for free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warms a three-car garage in subzero
reviews.reviewText: We needed a detached garage heater, and this is it. Aesthetically, I love the thing! Practically, it is a workhorse producing an abundance of heat. The garage stayed at approx 38-40 degrees when the ambient temps were zero and windchill in the negative teens. It is a real value to the money because I shopped for several years before this investment. I suggest you wear gloves as the entire body (cast iron) conducts heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Smoke billows from under the front of the stove and none goes out the chimney.
reviews.reviewText: This stove top edging was broken off in shipping, so they offered me 50% refund instead of a new stove. I accepted and assembled the stove and installed some stove pipe. I lit a small fire in the stove and smoke billowed out under the front of the stove - there are two big square holes under there with no way to close them. Smoke also came out of the front of the door where there is a vent. I had the chimney damper open, and no smoke was coming out of the chimney, all of it was exiting into my house. There is a weird "baffle" in the top of the stove and the instructions say not to alter it in any way, but it seems to be sealing the firebox from the chimney, thus the smoke exiting the front and bottom of the stove. What a colossal waste of time and effort for this POS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a perfect stove but for a small cabin or shop it works great!
reviews.reviewText: I installed one in a small cabin, and it took a bit to get it dialed in. I would recommend not drilling or modifying anything until you take time to learn how it works best for your situation. I was surprised that it does have a seal around the door that is replaceable, but the cast hinges are a bit off, so it never seals perfect but good enough. The door latch is not real robust so got to be careful with that.My biggest complaint is that it has a front vent on the door that is wide open and not adjustable. If the manufacturer reads this, please design a door with an adjustable vent. There is a fix that works well for this which is to put some steel wool into the vent to adjust the flow of air into the firebox. By doing this I can load the box 1/2- 3/4 full and get about 4 hours of burn time with my damper closed.I had a similar stove to this, that had an adjustable vent in the door and worked really well.Gave it 4 stars because no door vent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY nice cast iron Wood Stove
reviews.reviewText: This stove is well cast and it's easy to assemble the draft plate, legs and the plate located at the door. I haven't fired it up yet but it's supposed to be able to heat 900 sq. ft. It is not a LARGE stove but the top has two heating plated for you to cook on if you want too and the top is VERY thick cast iron. The door is hefty for it's size and seals very well (but US Stove says to change out the door sealing rope every 1-2 years).>>> Be sure to use a US Stove DR6 Barometric Draft Regulator (about $70 unless to can find it on sale ... see Amazon (currently $36 but it is Prime Day today).This beast is HEAVY ... about 130+ pounds. The shipping box leaves much to be desired so receiving the stove in perfect physical condition might be questionable (quite a few Customer reviews have mentioned this) but Amazon will back you by giving you options if it arrived with any shipping damage or factory defect(s).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Missing a hole for the door peg
reviews.reviewText: They send me a new door so I changed my rating to 5 stars. It's a nice stove. The company takes care of you. I'm ready happy with the stove. It's warm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Billows smoke back into house
reviews.reviewText: I grew up with lighting wood stoves. I bought this on sale in July, A red flag went up when I saw the chimney exit was blocked with a plate. Finally I am getting a chance to use it and my it seems my sense was right about it. I have never had so much smoke bellow backwards into my home trying to light a stove! There new design is supposed to make it so you don"t need a damper. Seriously bring back the damper! It's too late to return it. My husband is planing in removing it or drilling it out to help the air move

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wood stove.
reviews.reviewText: This wood stove heats up great. I have it in my 650 sqft shop. With fans circulating the air air it really feels good. I recommend this stove if you’re needing to heat up your shop.
